getPublicInputsOfZkJwtProof(bytes32).details: - When a proof is stored with publicInput into the this smart contract via the recordPositionAndSalaryProof(), the given proof is verfied by the validation.         Hence, the publicInput is guaranteed to be valid and a proof does not need to be specified in this function.

getNullifierByWalletAddress().notice: - Retrieve the nullifierHash by a caller's wallet address.

getPublicInputsOfAllProofs().notice: - Retrieve the publicInputs of all proofs from on-chain to be displayed on the UI (front-end).

getPublicInputsOfZkJwtProof(bytes32).notice: - Retrieve the publicInputs of a given proof from on-chain.

recordPublicInputsOfZkJwtProof(bytes,byt.notice: - Record the publicInputs of a given ZK-JWT proof on-chain.
